hero.title: Ship with
hero.subtitle: Track Every Mile
hero.description: Professional logistics platform connecting clients, drivers, and fleet management with real-time tracking. We deliver to exactly where you are located - no matter where you are. Streamline your cargo operations with our advanced transportation management system.
hero.descriptionShort: Professional cargo delivery platform with real-time tracking and secure payment options.

pricingSection.title: Transparent Pricing
pricingSection.subtitle: Clear, upfront pricing with no hidden fees.
pricingSection.getQuoteDescription: Enter your shipment details to get an accurate price estimate.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about our services.

tracking.question: How do I track my shipment?
tracking.answer: Once you book a shipment, you'll receive a tracking link via SMS and email. You can also track your cargo in real-time through our website or mobile app.

payment.question: What payment methods do you accept?
payment.answer: We accept mobile money (MTN, Airtel), bank transfers, online payments, and cash on delivery where available.

delivery.question: How long does delivery take?
delivery.answer: Delivery times vary based on distance and service type. Same-day delivery is available for urgent shipments, while standard delivery typically takes 1-3 business days.

damage.question: What if my cargo is damaged?
damage.answer: All our drivers are insured and we have a comprehensive damage policy. Contact our support team immediately if you notice any damage to your cargo.

address.question: Can I change the delivery address?
address.answer: Yes, you can change the delivery address up to 2 hours before the scheduled delivery time through our app or by contacting customer support.

weekend.question: Do you deliver on weekends?
weekend.answer: Yes, we offer weekend delivery services for an additional fee. You can select weekend delivery when booking your shipment.

helpCta.title: Still have questions?
helpCta.description: Can't find the answer you're looking for? Please chat to our friendly team.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.subtitle: Get in touch with our team for any questions or support you need.

getStarted.title: Ready to Get Started?
getStarted.subtitle: Join thousands of satisfied customers who trust Loveway Logistics for their delivery needs.

vehicles.title: Our Vehicle Fleet
vehicles.subtitle: Choose the right vehicle for your cargo needs. We have a diverse fleet to handle any shipment size.

truck.name: Heavy Truck
truck.description: Perfect for large shipments, construction materials, and heavy equipment. Our heavy trucks are equipped with advanced tracking and safety features.

van.name: Delivery Van
van.description: Ideal for medium-sized packages, documents, and small business deliveries. Fast and efficient for urban deliveries.

motorcycle.name: Delivery Motorcycle
motorcycle.description: Perfect for urgent deliveries, documents, and small packages. Navigates through traffic quickly for same-day delivery.
